articles.title: Apple's Real AI Crisis Isn't Siri, But the Talent It's Losing to Rivals
articles.summary: Apple has hemorrhaged around a dozen artificial intelligence staff to rivals since January, making it one of the prime victims in Silicon...

articles.title: Roblox rolls out open-source AI system to protect kids from predators in chats
articles.summary: Roblox, the online gaming platform wildly popular with children and teenagers, is rolling out an open-source version of an artificial intelligence system it says can help preemptively detect predatory language in game chats.
articles.translated_title: Roblox rolls out open-source AI system to protect kids from predators in chats

articles.title: Scientists want to prevent AI from going rogue by teaching it to be bad first
articles.summary: Researchers are trying to ‚Äúvaccinate‚Äù artificial intelligence systems against developing evil, overly flattering or otherwise harmful personality traits in a seemingly counterintuitive way: by giving them a small dose of those problematic traits.

articles.title: SoftBank Concedes Stargate Project With OpenAI Needs More Time
articles.summary: SoftBank Group Corp. said it‚Äôs taking longer than anticipated to get Stargate off the ground, conceding for the first time that the $500 billion artificial intelligence tie-up in the US with OpenAI is bogging down.

articles.title: Japan tech giant SoftBank Group sees better fortunes on surging AI stocks
articles.summary: Japanese technology conglomerate SoftBank Group has reported a $2.9 billion profit for the April-June quarter, rebounding from a loss a year earlier, as its investments benefited from the craze for artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Japan tech giant SoftBank Group sees better fortunes on surging AI stocks

articles.title: Google Pledges $1 Billion For AI Training At US Universities, Aims To Expand Globally
articles.summary: In a strategic move, Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOGL) (NASDAQ: GOOG) subsidiary Google has committed $1 billion to provide artificial intelligence (AI) offering educational resources and technical assistance to U.S. colleges and nonprofits.

articles.title: SoftBank Swings to Profit on Vision Fund Gains Ahead of AI Push
articles.summary: SoftBank Group Corp. swung to a bigger-than-expected profit in the June quarter, riding on gains from its bets on Nvidia Corp. and startups in a boost for founder Masayoshi Son‚Äôs bets on artificial intelligence technologies.

articles.summary: The search for the body of a hiker who vanished in Italy's Alps last September ended up being a remarkably quick one, thanks to artificial intelligence. The National Alpine...
